txt.en: 'I like you, little warrior. I wish to see some of your skill. Wargs are little creatures, much like you. The aurochs, they are more like us. Big, difficult to kill.\n\n'If you can bring us the meat of the aurochs, the Suuri-lehm√§ will hold you in high esteem indeed.'
Elder Tahvo has asked if you may impress him by delivering him meat from sturdy, tough-to-kill aurochs.
'Ah, delicious aurochs-meat! Such a little creature to bring down such a great creature. I am impressed, yes. You did well, little friend.'
'[placeholder], be welcome in Othrikar. We owe you greatly for all your help.'
'The aurochs are out in the field, little friend.'
Quartermaster Orgrin has asked you to help replenish Othrikar's food stores.
Bring the aurochs-meat to Elder Tahvo
The aurochs herds roam the foothills and plains of eastern Nan Amlug.\n\nElder Tahvo has asked you to impress him by hunting aurochs for their meat.
